QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_ConstructionMaterialResourceBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of construction material resources.

QtoDef.Name: GrossVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross volume of the material, including material placed and wasted.

QtoDef.Name: NetVolume
QtoDef.Definition: Total net volume of the material, including material placed but excluding material wasted.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross weight of the material, including material placed and wasted.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Total net weight of the material, including material placed but excluding material wasted.
